children: . Ganthaṃ

akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo ca nogantho akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
innerText: 3. Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo ca nogantho akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
Noganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi.
Ganthaṃ akusalañca noganthaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
